story_09_03000/2401_1001_0100_10:
Hah! I was told that a few Trainers were in
a tussle with Team Break, so I came to have
a look... Turns out it’s just you amateurs!
story_09_03000/2401_0401_0300_10:
Oh? So you remember me, then!
Yes, it is I, Lear! Owner and creator of this
magnificent island you all stand on!
story_09_03000/2401_0402_0500_10:
You must be joking, right? That is ridiculous!
No one forgets me, Lear, owner of Pasio!
story_09_03000/2401_1001_0600_10:
So you’re Lear, huh? Your reputation precedes
you...and not in a good way. To be honest,
people don’t speak very positively of you.
story_09_03000/2401_1001_0700_10:
Tell me, what’s the real reason you’re here?
I’d hate to think that you’re the one behind
all of this misconduct.
story_09_03000/2401_1001_0800_10:
Hah! Don’t be ridiculous! 
Me? Promote this foolishness on my own island?! 
The mere thought is insulting!
story_09_03000/2401_1001_0900_10:
The reason I came here in the first place was
to bring judgment on these thugs!
story_09_03000/2401_1001_1000_10:
Got it? Now stay out of my way.
Go crawl into a corner with your pathetic
team and leave this to a real Pokémon master!
story_09_03000/2401_1001_1100_10:
That guy said his name is Lear, right?
You know, I’m sure he must be rich and
powerful and all, but that was just plain rude!
story_09_03000/2401_1001_1200_10:
You’re not just gonna let him get away with
that attitude, right, [Name:PlayerNickname ]?!
story_09_03000/2401_1001_1300_10:
We should go and show that snooty Lear
that this team is anything but pathetic!
story_09_03000/2401_1001_1500_10:
Try not to let yourself get so worked up.
You’ll only tire yourself out.
story_09_03000/2401_1001_1600_10:
But aren’t you upset that he called your team
pathetic, Mr. Pryce?
story_09_03000/2401_1001_1700_10:
Sticks and stones, Iris. Words can’t hurt you if
you don’t let them. A Trainer should always
be calm and disciplined.
story_09_03000/2401_1001_1800_10:
Yeah, I think I know what you mean.
Working together as a team is probably a lot
harder if you’re all worked up and angry.
story_09_03000/2401_1001_1900_10:
Indeed... It sounds like young Iris here is
already much wiser about these things than
our haughty friend, Lear.
story_09_03000/2401_1001_2000_10:
Come! I think perhaps it’s time to show him
exactly what this team is capable of!
